SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETSPONSORSHIPID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the active Sponsorship ID for a Sponsorship Opportunity
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETSPONSORSHIPID ( @sponsorshipOpportunityID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin
declare @sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null declare @statusCode_Active tinyint = 1
if @sponsorshipOpportunityID is not null select @sponsorshipID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = @sponsorshipOpportunityID and STATUSCODE = @statusCode_Active
return @sponsorshipID end
